input_args.passage: 'American | The greatest fiction books since 1950(1 to 50) determined by 130 lists and articles from various critics, authors and experts.'
input_args.claim: 'Now, looking at citation, we see that Elie Wiesel has held the role of Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he has taught “Literature of Memory.” Additionally, he served as Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.'
